title: Ep62 Drug Deals Gone Bad
description: This week, the gals sniff out some cases involving illicit drugs and the many ways they'll screw you over. Topics include a global opium squabble, a young entrepreneur with a straightforward sales pitch, and a man with a lot more to offer in his (ahem) southern head than his northern one. Score a bottle of Winc's Dime Red Blend, make sure the safety's on, don't answer the door, and tune in for Drug Deals Gone Bad.   This ep is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your 1st month at www.talkspace.com/gals
